A fine time to slow down, kick back, and have some good ole fun. The warmer months are also a time when we crave fresh, clean flavors with a dose of real fruit pulp that gives as much back to our health as to our picky taste buds. Which is why the sparkling, refreshing goodness of Spindrift® is the perfect mixer on a hot summer day when selfies by the pool are a rite of passage. Whether it’s a berrylicious mojito, a tart creamsicle, or a bright citrus punch you favor—a Spindrift® cocktail shall be your summer lifesaver. See our seasonal cocktail recipes featuring the light and airy Spindrift® Sparkling Water with a healthyish dose of real fruit—never the fake stuff—and settle in for one heck of a delicious summer.Summer JamBlackberries pack a powerful punch of antioxidants and bright, ripe sweetness. Muddle fresh berries and mint, add rum, pour over crushed ice, top it off with Spindrift® Blackberry, and reap all of the sparkling benefits.Dream of LemonsLike the greatest-ever summer in a glass: Strawberry ice cream acts as a decadent “float”, topped with Campari, and dazzling Spindrift® Lemon. Why yes, we will have another!Strawberry Sunset PunchThis summery take on a classic punch involves sliced berries, loads of citrus, rum, and Spindrift® Strawberry. Serve in a classic punch bowl with ladle, and dish out single servings over ice. Guaranteed to be the star of a ripe party.Recipes you want to make. Cooking advice that works.
